author: nflaig
content: #4005 is not just readability, it simplfies parsing of the data, ie. no need to extract the single true bit from committee bits. The max size of the data is also a lot smaller as aggregate_bits max size is 64 times smaller, and we have to deserialize the data before we can validate the signature. I don't think it's as strong as a DoS vector as with single attestation. Major benefit is cleanup by having a succinct type for aggregate attestation.
